Deficiency Narrative: Personnel high school/university documentation was not present in the corresponding record.
Correction Narrative: An email was sent on 8/15/25 stating the staff provided the documentation of his high school diploma. Moving forward, the personnel file will be audited at least 14 days after the hire date. If we dont have the information, a request will be sent to the employee to provide the documentation, and we will follow up 5 business days later.

Deficiency Narrative: Staff medication was left in the refrigerator and accessible to children.
Correction Narrative: During a follow-up inspection, there was no medication observed in the refrigerator. Additionally, all other medication was observed to be double locked and inaccessible to children.

Deficiency Narrative: In one out of three staff files reviewed it was observed that one of the staff members did not have a notarized Licensing Affidavit for Applicants for Employment form.
Correction Narrative: A copy of the notarized Licensing Affidavit for Applicants for Employment has been received and a copy has been placed in employee file.

Deficiency Narrative: In one out of the three staff files reviewed there was no current job description in the file.
Correction Narrative: A current job description copy has been received and filed in the employee's records.

Deficiency Narrative: The information on the service plan reviews is not updated thoroughly.
Correction Narrative: All information from the previous plan of service will be eliminated and new information will be updated.

Deficiency Narrative: Under the supervision section of the service plan, there are no indications what level of supervision each child requires.
Correction Narrative: Moving forward the treatment team will include instructions to caregivers about the level of supervision required.  These levels will indicate if they are to be one to one, within eyesight of staff, within earshot of staff or if they are to be at arms length during waking hours.

Deficiency Narrative: Orientation documentation is missing from two out of the three files reviewed.
Correction Narrative: The children signed their orientation. Going forward audits of childs record will be completed after admission to ensure orientation has been signed.

Deficiency Narrative: The bedroom located near the living  room had an outlet that was partially cover, There is a hole in the middle of one of the closet doors. There was a yellow substance found in the refrigerator located in storage area.
Correction Narrative: A follow up inspection was conducted and it was found that the buildings and outlets were structurally  sound, clean, and in good repair. There were no further concerns.

Deficiency Narrative: There was no soap or papertowles or towels  located in either of the children restrooms.
Roaches were observed in the  kitchen cabinet.
Correction Narrative: A follow-up inspection was conducted and there were no concerns for roaches in the kitchen cabinets. Furthermore, the Director provided a copy of the last three months pest control reports.
